chart.title: Food: emissions from production and the supply chain
chart.subtitle: [Greenhouse gas emissions](#dod:ghgemissions) are measured in kilograms of [carbon dioxide-equivalents](#dod:carbondioxideequivalents) (CO₂eq) per kilogram of food.

food_emissions_land_plus_farm.titleShort: Land use change, on-farm, and animal feed
food_emissions_land_plus_farm.titleLong: Land use change, on-farm, and animal feed
food_emissions_land_plus_farm.citationShort: – processed by Our World in Data
food_emissions_land_plus_farm.citationLong: – processed by Our World in Data. “Land use change, on-farm, and animal feed” [dataset]. Poore, J., & Nemecek, T. (2018). Reducing food’s environmental impacts through producers and consumers. Science, 360(6392), 987-992. [original data].

food_emissions_supply_chain.citationShort: – processed by Our World in Data
food_emissions_supply_chain.citationLong: – processed by Our World in Data. “Supply chain (processing, transport, packaging, retail)” [dataset]. Poore, J., & Nemecek, T. (2018). Reducing food’s environmental impacts through producers and consumers. Science, 360(6392), 987-992. [original data].
